schedule.author: JavaScript Zagreb
schedule.author_desc: A monthly meetup of JavaScript developer enthusiasts from Zagreb and region.
schedule.title: NodeSchool workshop - learn JavaScript
schedule.description: NodeSchool events are open source workshops that teach web software skills, focused on Node and JavaScript. The organization is fully non profit and events are organized all over the world. At this event we will focus on getting you write your first Node application. Every participant will be assigned a mentor who will guide him through NodeSchool tutorials. Bring your laptops with power adapters and we will prepare the rest.

schedule.author: 404 Agency
schedule.author_desc: Agency 404 is a common denominator for a team of experts in the field of communications and digital media, at any time ready to offer the best solutions to the challenges you face in business. With acquired knowledge, specialized skills and proactive approach 404 can find solutions in the field of digital communications, public relations and design and production.
schedule.title: Digital Advertising

schedule.author: Marin Kereša
schedule.author_desc: Marin Kereša, musician, producer and recording engineer, has been engaged in audio production and sound research for over ten years. Director and founder of audio/video production studio nuArs d.o.o., he leads the nuSynergetic NGO (whose goal is to promote, develop and improve alternative cultural creativity, innovative and experimental artistic practices and multidisciplinary approach in the field of culture and audio-visual and performing arts), he’s also the initiator and leader of nuArs Session (experimental, multidisciplinary artistic project).
schedule.title: Audio signal flow in music production
schedule.description: One of the most important aspects in music production is audio signal flow. Signal flow is a path of process where audio signal propagates from its source through transduction (acoustic-electric-digital) to final preparation and adaptation for media. In this workshop we will pay attention to analysing the most common problems and mistakes in this area of production and proper use of terminology. Throughout the workshop the whole process is presented practically, using appropriate gear and Logic Pro X programme.

schedule.author: Monika Rusak
schedule.author_desc: Monika Rusak was born 1991. in Varaždin. In 2013. she finished professional Graphical studies with emphasis in multimedia on the Polytechnic in Varaždin, acquired the title of bacc. ing. techn. graph.2013. - 2015. Academy of Applied Arts at the University of Rijeka, graduate study Media Arts and practices (course: Intermedia). Currently she is working as graphic editor at Varaždinske vijesti. Through three years of education at the Polytechnic in Varaždin , she intensely does photography as well as other media: video and sound.
schedule.title: Forever: a documentary-experimental film
schedule.description: The project «Forever» is a documentary-experimental short film that lasts 15 minutes. It is about the passing of life and the longevity of the life's greatest values. Documented recordings of the protagonist, R.J. (88), around whose life story the non-linear narrative is bulit around, are used in the film. The passing of life is shown through the simbolic use of water as the main driver of the story that metaphorically depicts the protagonist's love life, while the scenery around the river Drava and the city of Varaždin.
